title: Account
description: Tracks balance, charges, for patient or cost center.(Based on HL7 FHIR Release 5 specifications)

fhir:billingStatus.title: Billing Status
fhir:billingStatus.description: Tracks the lifecycle of the account through the billing process.

fhir:type.title: Type
fhir:type.description: Categorizes the account for reporting and searching purposes.

fhir:name.title: Name
fhir:name.description: Name used for the account when displaying it to humans in reports, etc.

fhir:subject.title: Subject
fhir:subject.description: Identifies the entity which incurs the expenses. While the immediate recipients of services or goods might be entities related to the subject, the expenses were ultimately incurred by the subject of the Account.

fhir:servicePeriod.title: Service Period
fhir:servicePeriod.description: The date range of services associated with this account.

fhir:coverage.title: Coverage
fhir:coverage.description: The party(s) that are responsible for covering the payment of this account, and what order should they be applied to the account.

xdm:coverage.title: Coverage
xdm:coverage.description: The party(s) that contribute to payment (or part of) of the charges applied to this account (including self-pay).

xdm:priority.title: Priority
xdm:priority.description: The priority of the coverage in the context of this account.

fhir:owner.title: Owner
fhir:owner.description: Indicates the service area, hospital, department, etc. with responsibility for managing the Account.

fhir:description.title: Description
fhir:description.description: Provides additional information about what the account tracks and how it is used.

fhir:guarantor.title: Guarantor
fhir:guarantor.description: The parties responsible for balancing the account if other payment options fall short.

xdm:onHold.title: On Hold
xdm:onHold.description: A guarantor may be placed on credit hold or otherwise have their role temporarily suspended.

xdm:period.title: Period
xdm:period.description: The timeframe during which the guarantor accepts responsibility for the account.

fhir:diagnosis.title: Diagnosis
fhir:diagnosis.description: When using an account for billing a specific Encounter the set of diagnoses that are relevant for billing are stored here on the account where they are able to be sequenced appropriately prior to processing to produce claim(s).

xdm:sequence.title: Sequence
xdm:sequence.description: Ranking of the diagnosis (for each type).

xdm:condition.title: Condition
xdm:condition.description: The diagnosis relevant to the account.

xdm:dateOfDiagnosis.title: Date Of Diagnosis
xdm:dateOfDiagnosis.description: Date of the diagnosis (when coded diagnosis).

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: Type that this diagnosis has relevant to the account (e.g. admission, billing, discharge â€¦).

xdm:onAdmission.title: On Admission
xdm:onAdmission.description: Was the Diagnosis present on Admission in the related Encounter.

xdm:packageCode.title: Package Code
xdm:packageCode.description: The package code can be used to group diagnoses that may be priced or delivered as a single product. Such as DRGs.

fhir:procedure.title: Procedure
fhir:procedure.description: When using an account for billing a specific Encounter the set of procedures that are relevant for billing are stored here on the account where they are able to be sequenced appropriately prior to processing to produce claim(s).

xdm:sequence.title: Sequence
xdm:sequence.description: Ranking of the procedure (for each type).

xdm:code.title: Code
xdm:code.description: The procedure relevant to the account.

xdm:dateOfService.title: Date Of Service
xdm:dateOfService.description: Date of the procedure when using a coded procedure. If using a reference to a procedure, then the date on the procedure should be used.

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: How this procedure value should be used in charging the account.

xdm:device.title: Device
xdm:device.description: Any devices that were associated with the procedure.

fhir:relatedAccount.title: Related Account
fhir:relatedAccount.description: Other associated accounts related to this account.

fhir:currency.title: Currency
fhir:currency.description: The default currency for the account.

fhir:balance.title: Balance
fhir:balance.description: The calculated account balances - these are calculated and processed by the finance system.

xdm:aggregate.title: Aggregate
xdm:aggregate.description: Who is expected to pay this part of the balance.

xdm:term.title: Term
xdm:term.description: The term of the account balances - The balance value is the amount that was outstanding for this age.

xdm:estimate.title: Estimate
xdm:estimate.description: The amount is only an estimated value - this is likely common for current term balances, but not with known terms (that were generated by a backend process).

xdm:amount.title: Amount
xdm:amount.description: The actual balance value calculated for the age defined in the term property.

fhir:calculatedAt.title: Calculated At
fhir:calculatedAt.description: Time the balance amount was calculated.
